title.rendered: Top Fin® Pre-Conditioned Aquarium Water Set

content.rendered: Ingredients: Rabbit with Ground Bone, Olive Oil, Pumpkin Seed, Potassium Chloride, Organic Cranberries, Organic Spinach, Organic Broccoli, Organic Beets, Sodium Phosphate Monobasic, Organic Carrots, Organic Squash, Organic Apples, Organic Blueberries, Choline Chloride.

excerpt.rendered:
DESCRIPTION
Make your aquarium healthy and safe for your fish with top Fin Pre-Conditioned Aquarium Water. This pre-conditioned water is perfect for start-up and maintenance. Use when setting up a new aquarium and during routine water changes. Only at PetSmart.

Features:

Allows immediate introduction of fish
Helps support slime coat of fish
Helps combat ammonia
Free from harmful chlorine and chloramine

Intended For: Freshwater Aquariums

Includes: 2.3 gallons of Pre-Conditioned Aquarium Water; Bacteria Boost packet with Botanical Extracts (Under Cap)

Use: Aquarium Water

Total Weight: 2.3 Gallons (8.7 L)

Buy this product on petsmart.com
